rtega_mnemonic:

humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The first essay is "爿", followed by the note symbol " Wood ", written as " Bed ". From " wood ", "爿" sound. The original meaning is a device for people to sit and sleep. "Release name. "Shut down the bed": "When a person sits and lies on a bed. The bed is fitted, so it is self-loaded." "Shuowen": "The bed, the one who sits on the body. From the wood, the sound." The variant is the " bed ."

Bronze inscriptions are suspected to be used as place names, and fourteen-year-old bronze rhinoceros: "Beds and Fushou (Xu) Shiren (made) [倝目] device." Used in silk books as the names of medicines, see "Mawangdui Silk Book." "Fifty-two prescriptions for sickness", line 370 "Cnidonia".

Examples of the original meaning of " bed " are like "Poetry. Bin Feng. "July": "I stay at home in September, and crickets will come under my bed in October." "Zhan Guo Ce. "Qi Ce III": "Meng Changjun traveled to the country, to Chu, and offered an elephant bed."

" Bed " by extension means a sitting frame on which utensils are placed. For example, Chen Xuling of the Southern Dynasties "Preface to the New Chanting of Yutai": "The jade pen bed, always leave your hand." "New Tang Book. Recluse biography. "Lu Guimeng": "If you don't ride a horse, you will set up a canopy seat on a boat, and you will exchange books, tea stoves, pen beds, and fishing tackle."

" Bed " also means well fence. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Li He's "Houyuan Sinking Song": "Inoue's roller wheel turns on the bed, the sound of water is frequent, and the sound of silk is shallow." Wang Qi explained: "The bed, the well fence." Li Shangyin "Fuping Shaohou": "No Collecting gold bullets and throwing them out of the forest, but unfortunately the silver bed is at the head of the well."

" Bed " can also be used as a measure word, such as "Northern History. "The Legend of Yuanhe": "Build a city between the two towns, set up a city with ten thousand people, give 12 beds to the crossbow, and three hundred military guards." "Golden Jade Slaves Beating Lovers": "Later, rich and wealthy, a bed of brocade was covered, and this was excellent in beggars."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The first essay is "爿", followed by the note symbol " Wood ", written " Bed " From " wood ", "爿" sound. The original meaning is a device for people to sit and sleep.
humanum_full_description:
初文作「爿」，後加注意符「木」，寫作「牀」。從「木」，「爿」聲。本義是供人坐臥的器具。《釋名．釋牀帳》：「人所坐臥曰牀。牀，裝也，所以自裝載也。」《說文》：「牀，安身之坐者。从木，爿聲。」異體作「床」。

　　金文疑用為地名，十四㭉銅犀：「牀麀嗇夫䣄（徐）戠靭（製）[倝目]器。」帛書中用為藥名，見《馬王堆帛書．五十二病方》第370行「蛇牀子」。

　　「牀」表示本義的例子如《詩．豳風．七月》：「九月在戶，十月蟋蟀入我牀下。」《戰國策．齊策三》：「孟嘗君出行國，至楚，獻象牀。」

　　「牀」引申表示安放器物的坐架。如南朝陳徐陵〈玉臺新詠序〉：「翡翠筆牀，無時離手。」《新唐書．隱逸列傳．陸龜蒙》：「不乘馬，升舟設蓬席，齎束書、茶竈、筆牀、釣具往來。」

　　「牀」又表示井欄。如唐代李賀〈後園鑿井歌〉：「井上轆轤牀上轉，水聲繁，絲聲淺。」王琦彙解：「牀，井欄也。」李商隱〈富平少侯〉：「不收金彈拋林外，卻惜銀牀在井頭。」

　　「牀」還可作量詞，如《北史．源賀傳》：「二鎮之間築城，城置萬人，給強弩十二牀，武衞三百乘。」《喻世明言．金玉奴棒打薄情郎》：「後來富貴發達，一牀錦被遮蓋，這都是叫化中出色的。」
humanum_short_description: 初文作「爿」，後加注意符「木」，寫作「牀」。從「木」，「爿」聲。本義是供人坐臥的器具。

Original meaning 本义: Meaning bed.

English senses 英语理解: bed, couch; framework, chassis

Usage example 用法举例: 床單 chuáng dān (bedspread)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1094

Shuowen 说文解字: 安身之坐者從木爿聲徐锴曰左傳薳子馮詐病掘地下冰而牀焉至於恭坐則席也故從爿爿則疒之省象人衺身有所倚箸至於牆壯戕狀之屬並當從牀省聲李陽冰言木右為片左為爿音牆且說文無爿字其書亦異故知其妄

Hanzi: 床

初文作「 爿 」，後加注意符「 木 」，寫作「 牀 」。從「 木 」，「 爿 」聲。本義是供人坐臥的器具。《釋名．釋牀帳》：「人所坐臥曰牀。牀，裝也，所以自裝載也。」《說文》：「牀，安身之坐者。从木，爿聲。」異體作「 床 」。 金文疑用為地名，十四㭉銅犀：「牀麀嗇夫䣄（徐）戠靭（製）[倝目]器。」帛書中用為藥名，見《馬王堆帛書．五十二病方》第370行「蛇牀子」。 「 牀 」表示本義的例子如《詩．豳風．七月》：「九月在戶，十月蟋蟀入我牀下。」《戰國策．齊策三》：「孟嘗君出行國，至楚，獻象牀。」 「 牀 」引申表示安放器物的坐架。如南朝陳徐陵〈玉臺新詠序〉：「翡翠筆牀，無時離手。」《新唐書．隱逸列傳．陸龜蒙》：「不乘馬，升舟設蓬席，齎束書、茶竈、筆牀、釣具往來。」 「 牀 」又表示井欄。如唐代李賀〈後園鑿井歌〉：「井上轆轤牀上轉，水聲繁，絲聲淺。」王琦彙解：「牀，井欄也。」李商隱〈富平少侯〉：「不收金彈拋林外，卻惜銀牀在井頭。」 「 牀 」還可作量詞，如《北史．源賀傳》：「二鎮之間築城，城置萬人，給強弩十二牀，武衞三百乘。」《喻世明言．金玉奴棒打薄情郎》：「後來富貴發達，一牀錦被遮蓋，這都是叫化中出色的。」

"Shut down the bed": "When a person sits and lies on a bed. The bed is fitted, so it is self-loaded." "Shuowen": "The bed, the one who sits on the body. From the wood, the sound." The variant is the " bed." Bronze inscriptions are suspected to be used as place names, and fourteen-year-old bronze rhinoceros: "Beds and Fushou (Xu) Shiren (made) [倝目] device." Used in silk books as the names of medicines, see "Mawangdui Silk Book." "Fifty-two prescriptions for sickness", line 370 "Cnidonia". Examples of the original meaning of " bed" are like "Poetry. Bin Feng. "July": "I stay at home in September, and crickets will come under my bed in October." "Zhan Guo Ce. "Qi Ce III": "Meng Changjun traveled to the country, to Chu, and offered an elephant bed." " Bed" by extension means a sitting frame on which utensils are placed. For example, Chen Xuling of the Southern Dynasties "Preface to the New Chanting of Yutai": "The jade pen bed, always leave your hand." "New Tang Book. Recluse biography. 牀字的基本解释

牀
chuáng
同“床”。

牀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuáng］
［《廣韻》士莊切，平陽，崇。］
亦作“床1”。
(1)供人睡卧的家具。
(2)古代坐具。
(3)安设床铺。
(4)在床上睡觉。
(5)安放器物的支架、几案等。
(6)井上围栏。
(7)物之底部。
(8)量词。犹架，座。
(9)量词。犹套，副。
(10)量词。指一对夫妇所承担的租调量。
(11)量词。犹条。用于被褥等物。

牀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【爿字部】　牀； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页691第15
【唐韻】【集韻】仕莊切【正韻】助莊切，?狀平聲。【說文】安身之坐者。【廣韻】簀也。【釋名】人所坐臥曰牀。牀，裝也。所以自裝載也。【廣雅】棲謂之牀。【通俗文】八尺曰牀。【易·剝卦】剝牀以足。【註】牀者，人所以安也。　又井榦曰牀。【樂府·淮南王篇】後園鑿井銀作牀。　又【爾雅·釋草】盱虺牀。【註】蛇牀也。一名馬牀。　【廣韻】俗作床。

牀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
牀字的起名意思

暂无。

bed
Basic explanation of words
bed
chuang
Same as "bed".
bed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuáng］
["Guangyun" Shizhuangqie, Pingyang, Chong. ]
Also known as "Bed 1".
(1) Furniture for people to sleep on.
(2) Ancient seats.
(3) Install beds.
(4) Sleep in bed.
(5) Brackets and cases for placing utensils.
(6) Inoue fence.
(7) The bottom of the thing.
(8) Quantifiers. Still frame, seat.
(9) Quantifiers. Still set, vice.
(10) Quantifiers. Refers to the amount of rent adjustment undertaken by a couple.
(11) Quantifiers. Yutiao. Used for bedding and other things.
bed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fan Character Department] 　床; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 691 No. 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Shizhuang Qi [Zheng Yun] Helps Zhuang Qi, and the sound is flat. [Said the text] The person who sits in peace. 【Guang Yun】Cui Ye. [Release name] Where people sit and lie on the bed. The bed, outfit also. So self-loading also. [Guangya] The bed of habitation. [Popular text] Ba Chi is called a bed. 【Easy Peeling Gua】Peel the bed to get enough. [Note] People who are in bed are so happy.　Youjing dry and said the bed. 【Yuefu·Huainan King】Houyuan sinking a well and making a silver bed.　[Erya·Shucao] Xujiao bed. [Note] The snake bed is also. A horse bed.　[Guangyun] Popular as a bed.
